## Discussion

An `lseek(2)` function was issued on a socket, pipe or FIFO.

# illegalSeek

**Type Property**

Illegal seek.

## Declaration

```swift
static var illegalSeek: Errno { get }
```

## Discussion

An `lseek(2)` function was issued on a socket, pipe or FIFO.

The corresponding C error is `ESPIPE`.

## Pipe Errors

- **brokenPipe**: Broken pipe.
title: illegalSeek
